DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine efficacy safety ONO-2506 compare placebo patient acute ischemic stroke .
DOC.brief_title: Study ONO-2506 Patients With Acute Ischemic Stroke
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects clinical diagnosis acute ischemic stroke 2 . Subjects within 72 hour onset stroke 3 . Other inclusion criterion may apply . 1 . Subjects schedule surgical operation likely affect prognosis ( include intravascular surgery circulatory reconstruction ) 2 . Subjects pregnant lactating , childbearing potential , wish become pregnant . 3 . Other exclusion criterion may apply .
